title: CUDA error: invalid device function
body_html:
I built PyTorch from source for CUDA 7.5, but get the following runtime error when trying to add GPU tensors:

>>> torch.__version__
'0.1.12+0ba2043'

>>> torch.cuda.is_available()
True

>>> x = torch.rand(5, 3).cuda()
>>> y = torch.rand(5, 3).cuda()
>>> x + y
THCudaCheck FAIL file=/gpfsnyu/home/ks3286/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/generated/../generic/THCTensorMathPointwise.cu line=247 error=8 : invalid device function
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/gpfsnyu/home/ks3286/.conda/envs/conda_root/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/tensor.py", line 267, in __add__
    return self.add(other)
RuntimeError: cuda runtime error (8) : invalid device function at /gpfsnyu/home/ks3286/pytorch/torch/lib/THC/generated/../generic/THCTensorMathPointwise.cu:247
